May 3, 1961
Mr. William G. Harley
National Assoc, of Educational Broadcasters
1346 Connecticut Avenue
Washington 6, D. C.
Dear Mr. Harley:
After my letter to you on April 28, 1961, I wrote
the Governor and asked that he immediately contact
Congressman Oren.Harris. I am attaching a copy of
the Governor’s letter to Congressman Harris. Would
you please make a copy of the Governor’s comments
from his letter and return the letter to me for my
f i 1 es .
Sincerely yours.
President
